snippet: Mr. Kwan worked with his staff at the Hang Seng Bank to devise a widely used gauge for the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.
abstract: Stanley Kwan, banker and creator of the Hang Seng index, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kwan worked with his staff at the Hang Seng Bank to devise a widely used gauge for the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.

headline.seo: Stanley Kwan, Hang Seng Index Creator, Dies at 86
headline.main: Stanley Kwan, Hang Seng Index Creator, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Stanley Kwan, 86, Creator of the Hang Seng Index
